rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment factually reports numbers of cases and exposure sources.
The segment reports factual numbers of cases and linkage.
Segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports a number of cases and exposure type but lacks explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment reports exposure source, not capability or preparedness.
The segment reports factual quantification of cases linked to exposure: 'Six of the 16 reported human cases have been linked'.
